text: Bill Campbell (September 27, 1923 - October 6, 2014) was an American sportscaster in the Philadelphia area calling games for the Philadelphia Eagles, Philadelphia Phillies, Philadelphia Warriors, Philadelphia 76ers, and college football. ==References== Category:Sportspeople from New Jersey Category:College football broadcasters Category:National Football League broadcasters Category:National Basketball Association broadcasters Category:Major League Baseball broadcasters Category:2014 deaths Category:1923 births
title: Bill Campbell
